mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_pw, m_name, m_nickname, m_phone, m_address, m_state, m_auth) values (#{m_email}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address}, #{m_state}, #{m_auth})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_email = #{m_email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_nickname = #{m_nickname}
select m_email from member where m_name={#m_name}, m_email={#m_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET m_pw=#{m_pw}, m_phone=#{m_phone}, m_nickname=#{m_nickname}, m_zipcode=#{m_zipcode}, m_address=#{m_address} WHERE m_email=#{m_email}
mapper.select: select id from member where m_name=#{m_name}, m_phone=#{m_phone}
